# LocAgent Baseline Version Information

## Source Repository
- **Original Repository**: https://github.com/gersteinlab/LocAgent
- **Paper**: https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.09089 (arXiv-2503.09089v2)
- **Datasets**:
  - SWE-bench Lite: czlll/SWE-bench_Lite
  - Loc-Bench V1: czlll/Loc-Bench_V1

## Local Copy Information
- **Location**: tmp/LocAgent/
- **Copy Date**: 2025-10-18 (from CDSAgent project setup)
- **Note**: Copied without .git history for reference purposes

## Python Environment
- **Python Version**: 3.12 (recommended by LocAgent README)
- **System Python**: 3.14.0 (macOS, /opt/homebrew/bin/python3)
- **Dependencies**: requirements.txt from LocAgent repository

## Graph Index Version
- **Version**: v2.3 (from LocAgent README ยง2.3)
- **Configuration**:
  - Node types: 4 (directory, file, class, function)
  - Edge types: 4 (contain, import, invoke, inherit)

## BM25 Configuration
- **Parameters** (from PRD-06 ยง2.2):
  - k1: 1.5
  - b: 0.75
- **Tokenization**: camelCase/snake_case splitting with stop words

## Baseline Extraction Date
- **Date**: 2025-10-20
- **Extracted By**: Claude Code Agent
- **Purpose**: Parity validation for CDSAgent 0.1.0-MVP Rust refactoring

## Notes
- LocAgent paper published: March 2025 (arXiv:2503.09089v2)
- Graph version 2.3 is the latest stable version used in paper benchmarks
- All baseline data extracted using LocAgent's own codebase as ground truth
- Additional sample repos selected from SWE-bench Lite for comprehensive validation
